properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Oh karunaanidhi mahaa prabhu Yesu neeve simhasanaasinuda vaitivi{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Satya swaroopivi parishuddudavu Daaveedu thaalamu kalgiyunnaavu Neevu therichinadi mooyagaleru Bhandinchinadi theruvagalerevvaru nee mahaatmyamade{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Edu nakshatramulu neechetha kalavu Deepa stambhamula madya Sancharinchedavu jeevinchuvadavu Aadi antamulu rendanchula Khadgam kaligina prabhuvaa adiye nee ghanatha{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
v4
v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Ellaru prabhuni stutinchedaru saagila padedaru kruthajnulai Aashcharya kriyalu chesitivanchu Prabhuva neeve agamyuda vanchu Ninu koniyaadedamu{/lang-eng}
